name: Blockdown National Park
description:
Welcome to Blockdown National Park! In Blockdown, our world famous blocks fall from the sky, and our unique vegetation and animals are sure to add a shock to your day. Of course, please don't stand under our blocks; a splatter is really bad for the ecosystem. Please don't attempt to feed or pet the animals either; studies have shown that they will fatally attack you if you try to. Also, the main danger isn't the weird spring plants or the birds; it's the water. As our blocks fall down, the water will fall up. There's also some weird spheres in the water; apparently some archeologists say that they're really rare pearls. Also, please don't drown. Well, that's all I have to say. Enjoy your stay at Blockdown National Park!

Contains...
  • Falling blocks that will squish you
  • Really bouncy plants
  • Birds
  • Funny guys that jump
  • Good amount of rising water
  • Some pearls that can help you break blocks
  • A snail(that's you!)
Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move

Space Bar: Jump

Escape: Pause
